description.en-US: Ghostly hands manifest at crucial moments, blinding you. Doubles the amount of [Humiliation] in situations where eyesight is needed.
description.ja-JP: 重要な場面で視界を封じてくる一対のゴーストハンド。霊体なので取り外せず、暗闇の中で行動しなければならない。周囲が見えずに全身の感度が上がってしまい、開発度の増加量が2倍に。

description.en-US: A ghostly hand tickles you when you're trying to hold it. If your [Need to pee] or [Need to poo] is over 100%, adds 100 [Humiliation]
description.ja-JP: 我慢中に敏感な場所を擽って決壊を促す霊体。尿意100%以上でチビってしまい、開発度+100
階層ごとに開発度+100。判定時、尿意+100%で計算

description.en-US: A ghost hand that fondles your crotch and keeps you from pressing on your pee hole. Adds +100 [Horniness] per level, and increases [Need to pee] by 100% during an accident check.
A ghost hand that fondles your crotch. Adds +100 [Horniness] per level, but reduces [Need to pee] by 50% during an accident check.
description.ja-JP: 本人の代わりに股間を抑えてくれるゴーストハンド。いやらしく揉み解されて階層ごとに開発度+100。分岐時、尿意-50%で計算

description.en-US: A pair of ghost hands that massage your buttcheeks and hold them together. Adds +50 [Horniness] per level, but reduces [Need to poo] by 50% during an accident check.
A pair of ghost hands that massage your buttcheeks and spread them apart. Adds +50 [Horniness] per level, and increases [Need to poo] by 100% during an accident check.
description.ja-JP: を取得(尻頬に取り憑いた一対のゴーストハンド。霊体なので取り外せない。探索中にネチッこく揉みしだかれたり、恥ずかしい場所を広げられたり、ほじられたりして、階層ごとにイかされ開発度+50。

description.en-US: Your constitution is weakened, causing you to become incontinent when you cum.
description.ja-JP: 絶頂する度に失禁してしまう恥ずかしい体質。開発度の増加量2倍

description.en-US: When holding your crotch, you unconsciously masturbate, adding +100 to [Horniness].
description.ja-JP: 「股間を押えた」際、無意識に弄ってしまい、開発度+100

description.en-US: You feel pleasure from needing to go to the bathroom. If your [Need to pee] or [Need to poo] exceeds 100% at the end of a floor, add the difference to [Horniness].
description.ja-JP: 括約筋を締めることに快感を感じてしまう体質。内股に力を入れると気持ち良い。階を進むとき尿意100%以上なら、その数値分、開発度にも加算する。

description.en-US: You've been hypnotized into thinking it's a good idea to expose your breasts. Add +50 [Humiliation] when in public.
